headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SITNICK, LINDA HARRISON

snippet: SITNICK--Linda Harrison, May 22, 1945 - March 28, 2016. Beloved wife of Irving, loving mother of Elizabeth (David) and Samuel (Aleksandra), and proud grandmother of Sarah and Mark. She will be forever in our hearts. Services Tuesday, March 29, 2016 at 11:30am at Sutton Place Synagogue, 225 East 51st Street, New York, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SITNICK--Linda Harrison, May 22, 1945 - March 28, 2016. Beloved wife of Irving, loving mother of Elizabeth (David) and Samuel (Aleksandra), and proud grandmother of Sarah and Mark. She will be forever in our hearts. Services Tuesday, March 29, 2016 at 11:30am at Sutton Place Synagogue, 225 East 51st Street, New York, NY. 1/3
